content.text: Golden Time Hotel offers an airport shuttle (available on request) for VND 350000 per vehicle one way. You can indulge in facials or mani/pedis, then grab a bite to eat at the coffee shop/cafe. Other features include a bar/lounge and a terrace.

primary.value: This property offers transfers from the airport and train station (surcharges may apply); to arrange pick-up, guests must contact the property 48 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation
Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival
Credit card, debit card, or cash deposit required for incidental charges
Government-issued photo ID may be required
Local laws may restrict unmarried guests from sharing a room
No pets or service animals allowed
Onsite self parking (VND 100000 per day; includes in/out privileges)

content.text:
• Airport shuttle service is offered for an extra charge of VND 350000 per vehicle (one way)
  • Train station pick-up service is offered for an extra charge
• Self parking costs VND 100000 per day with in/out privileges

primary.value:
Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms.

Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property. The policies listed are provided by the property.

This property accepts credit cards.
Golden Time Hotel Hotel Nha Trang
